data.title: AI Tattoo Assistant
data.summary: Conversational assistant that guides clients through tattoo consultations and captures requirements for studio teams.
highlights: Implemented chat flows with Next.js and OpenAI APIs to provide design inspiration, readiness checklists, and follow-up prompts.
Embedded analytics to track engagement patterns that inform marketing and campaign targeting for partner studios.

data.title: LaPlazaTattoo
data.summary: Marketing platform for a Kansas City tattoo collective with lead capture, portfolio storytelling, and event promotion.
highlights: Built responsive Angular-inspired layouts in Next.js that highlight artist spotlights, testimonials, and booking CTAs.
Integrated form automation and social tracking pixels to connect campaign traffic with signed consultation requests.

data.title: Inkland Tattoo Marketplace
data.summary: Marketplace that connects tattoo artists and clients with role-based dashboards, job postings, and workflow tools.
highlights: Delivered multi-tenant features for artist portfolios, job bidding, and appointment tracking backed by a scalable API design.
Extended the platform with payment-ready flows and marketplace messaging to support future monetization.
